name: Tango Class By Veronica Trill
description: Class focus on basic steps technique, perfect for the ones who are first started to the dance.

name: Workshop By Dima
description: Workshop focus on leader technique, perfect for the leaders who want to improve his style of dancing.

name: Milonga dos anges
description: Social dance night, everyone is welcome to join and dance.

name: Friends meetup
description: We will spend a fun day together with music, dance and games.

name: Practica La Maria
description: Time to practice what you learn during class.

name: Christmas Milonga
description: This is the best Milonga of the year. We will offer a traditional Christmas dinner, a lot of good music to celebrate this amazing time together.

name: Milonga New Year
description: We are going to have dinner, dance all night long and watch the new year fireworks from our cozy Tango Rooftop by the beach.

name: Milonga Roses
description: This Milonga is dedicated to all Women as we all celebrate the International Women's Day.

name: Workshop Solento
description: This is a workshop by Valeria and Carlos, focused on Tango Nuevo technique followed by 2 hours of practice.

name: Tango Class By Monica Salles
description: Traditional Argentine Tango class, focused on leaders and followers basic steps.
